title: Soulphisticated Ladies: Episode 1
description: In this high octane serial drama, Selah, Moria, Gennifer and Vashti are lifelong friends. But when dirty little secrets and unexpected rivalries threaten their tumultuous relationships everything they thought was real is questioned. Bonds are broken and the loyalty that was once there is gone.  Will their problems overwhelm them or will they take control of their lives and start leading with their souls?
author: jaha Knight
